entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 9:27 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -10.1°C
Wind: SSW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early in the evening. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 18. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 27. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
